english.segment1: I won't be afraid anymore. Of the terrors by night. Or the arrow that flies by day. And though a thousand may fall. At my side. And though ten thousand may fall. In Him I'll put all my trust
english.segment2: CHORUS. He who dwells in the secret place. Of the Most High. Shall abide in the shadow. He who dwells in the secret place. Of the Most High. Shall abide in the shadow
english.segment3: I will hide in Your wings always. Your angels stand by to keep me. In all my ways. And though a thousand may fall. At my side. I will say in Him I trust
english.segment5: And though a thousand may fall. At my side. And though ten thousand may fall. I will say of the Lord. That in Him I put all my trust
